name: OPTISAFE
description: Protect your precious people and valuables with OPTISAFE!!  List of devices available in OPTISAFE. - My Buddy(Portable SOS Device)  *A device is required to use the OPTISAFE.   My Buddy(Portable SOS Device)  1. Siren - When in emergency, pull out the body case of My Buddy, The device will blow a 90dB siren.  2. Send an emergency message to family and friends -If you set up the receiver as another person, an emergency message will be sent to that person automatically when you separate the cover of the device  3. Send location to family and friends - If you set up the location tracing function on the OPTISAFE App, your location will be sent to the family and friends automatically when you separate the cover of the device.  4. Automatic Recording - When you separate the cover of the device, it will automatically start to record. You can check the recorded file using the OPTISAFE App.  5. Loss prevention function -You can set up the loss prevention function(Smart Tracker function) of your My Buddy using the OPTISAFE App.    **Caution - The loss prevention function is only a service that helps in preventing loss. it does not 100% prevent the loss of smart phones and items.  - Due to the nature of Bluetooth, which is being susceptible to frequency bands, smart phones may have a loading issue depending on the user environment.  - There can be restrictions depending on the smart phone model when various Bluetooth products are used at the same time.  #Bluetooth #BLE #Finder #Tracker #SOS
